title: A Special Message from Motoha Arai
detail:
Happy Valentine's, {NAME2}!
Just thinking about our date today makes me so happy that I can't stop smiling. I don't think I'll get a wink of sleep tonight at this rate!
Still, I wouldn't have it any other way. It'd be great if we could always hang out even after Valentine's is over!
Come to think of it, there's a bunch of stuff I wouldn't have been able to face head-on if you weren't around. Thanks for being there for me. And well, if it's okay with you... It'd be nice we could stay together from now on.
Let's make a ton more memories, just the two of us! Love you lots!
sender: Motoha Arai

title: A Special Message from Riko Tanemura
detail:
Hello, {NAME2}.
This may have been the first time I've ever had such an enjoyable Valentine's. It's a bit embarrassing but... it was a wonderful opportunity to know each other better.
You've truly taught me so much. Without you, I would have never gotten to know and experience a great number of things. For all that you've done, I wanted to show my thanks... And so, I've prepared a present that hopefully captures the essence of "I Love You" on this particular day.
You'll continue to stay by my side, won't you?
sender: Riko Tanemura

title: A Special Message from Yaoling Li
detail:
Happy Valentine's, {NAME2}-sensei!!
I have something to tell you and I'm definitely not missing my chance.
As you know, my parents told me to go out and experience the world. Before I left the country, I had no idea what they meant. But after meeting you, I think I finally get what they were saying.
When I'm with you, even if things are looking fun or frustrating, it always ends up being unforgettable. Sensei, thanks to you I could forget all my worries and fears and become the me you see today.
So then, I thought, maybe I came to Japan just so I could meet you!
Sensei, thank you so very much for everything. Looking forward to here on out.
sender: Yaoling Li

title: A Special Message from Tomoko Noge
detail:
{NAME2}-kun,
Sorry to message you out of the blue!
I actually wanted to come talk to you in person after class, but I ended up having to cover a shift at work...
For me, today feels special because it's the first Valentine's Day since we met.
After I was injured and couldn't continue baseball anymore, things were really hard for me. But then you were there. You picked me up and helped me keep moving forward. I was able to put all of that pain behind me because you were by my side.
Anyway, I'm just really glad I met you, and getting to spend time with you makes me really happy!
Sorry this message ended up being super long, but there's just one more thing. I actually made you a little something for Valentine's Day. I was wondering if after work I could stop by and give it to you?
sender: Tomoko Noge

title: A Special Message from Ayaka Sakai
detail:
{NAME1}-kun,
Happy Valentine's Day! I hope you like my present!
I've been thinking about the day we met a lot lately. If you hadn't been there back then I don't think I'd have had the courage to start street performing.
But because of you I was finally able to share my voice, and my song, with the world. I really feel like I'm living out my dreams.
I have a lot more songs I want to play for you, so I hope you'll keep on listening!
sender: Ayaka Sakai

title: A Special Message from Yumi Shiina
detail:
{NAME2}-kun,
Happy Valentine's!
Everyone thinks Valentine's Day is all about the chocolates. But you know, that's not all there is... There are other things adults like to do on Valentine's Day. Would you like to come to the bar tonight and find out?
Just kidding! Hehe, you're still too young for that!
Sorry for teasing you. But I do want you to come by the bar. I want you to try our special Valentine's mocktail. I think you'll really love the taste, so you have to come try it!

P.S. Once you're old enough to drink, I promise to make you a real cocktail. So you promise to try it, 'kay?
sender: Yumi Shiina

title: A Special Message from Miyu Sahara
detail:
To my favorite Big Bro:
Hey there! Have you been thinking about me today? Because I've sure been thinking about you!
It's Valentine's Day, after all. I wanted to get you the absolute best present I could. I was going over all the possibilities I could think of!
Oh, but I've gotta think about the price, too... It has to be within my budget. But you're always doing so much for me, so I really want to show my appreciation properly.
Thanks to you, I've been able to keep putting on the show I love. Since you supported me, I'm going to make sure it becomes the best show in the whole world!
So I want to absolutely, positively show you how much I love you forever and ever!
So then, you know where to find me, and I'll be waiting for you to stop by and say hello again!
sender: Miyu Sahara

title: A Special Message from Kotone Montagne
detail:
{NAME2}-kun,
Je t'aime.
Until now my every Valentine's Day was taken up by figure skating practice. I can't exactly eat much chocolate in my line of work either.
Maybe it's because I have you that today's Valentine's feels special. In wanting to express how much you mean to me, I find myself buying every Valentine's gift I see. This must be how my coach feels about expressing love through choreography.
Do you remember that day when I performed in front of you? You watched and you applauded, and ever since then you've become the most important person in my life.
That's why I promise to keep showing my love for you forever.
sender: Kotone Montagne

title: A Special Message from Runa Dogenzaka
detail:
{NAME2}-kun,
Woof! Woof! Hooray! And Happy Valentine's Day!
I've never really had experience with Valentines. I mean, I like chocolate as much as the next person, but I've never got any or had anyone to give them to. Shichi-kun won't accept food gifts, so what's the point right? That's why the closest I've come to Valentine's chocolate is browsing the underground mall displays in Shibuya.
But since I met you, this Valentine's was totally different! I worked really hard making chocolates to give you, and it was so much fun!
I think spending time with you has made me a lot more confident and willing to put myself out there, so thank you for that. Of course Shichi-kun is very important to me, but I couldn't imagine my life without you in it either!
Sooo, here's a Valentine's gift from me to you! See you around Shibuya!
sender: Runa Dogenzaka

title: AAAAAA==
detail:
Thank you for playing Persona5: The Phantom X.
In order to provide you with a better game experience, we are currently conducting a survey.
Your opinions are very important to us. All data collected from this survey will be kept confidential and used solely for the purpose of improving the game.

Upon completing the %s survey, you will receive Konpaku Gems x30,000 as a gift.

<link=""%s""><u><color=#0F69CA>Survey Link</color></u></link>
sender: Persona5: The Phantom X Operations Team
